Our Services

We provide a wide range of court order services to meet your needs:

Service of Process

Delivering legal documents to ensure that individuals are properly notified of their involvement in a court proceeding.

Subpoena Service

Serving subpoenas to compel individuals to testify or produce documents required for legal proceedings.

Document Retrieval

Obtaining court records and other documents from various institutions as needed for legal cases.

Eviction Notices

Serving eviction notices to tenants on behalf of landlords or property managers.

Summons and Complaints

Delivering summons and complaints to notify defendants of legal actions being taken against them.

Restraining Orders

Serving restraining orders to individuals to legally restrict their actions as directed by the court.

Areas of Service

(Including, All 50 States but not limited to)

Philadelphia Co.

Delaware Co.

New Jersey

Washington D.C.
